__e: When you're together, you see the other's faults
" He has all bad parts of his father. "
- He's blind to the faults of his friends.
It's what makes you a family, truly knowing one another, flaws and all.
Someone... I can trust, someone strong, someone... At peace with themselves, someone better than me,
I just wish you could stop seeing Holly for her faults and see her for what she really is... a young mom...
Now, your father was a good man, a flawed man, like anyone else.
It has its drawbacks like anything else, I suppose, but the army takes care of you and you've got a buddy for life.
